page.title: 09EAST LEAKE SQUASH CLUB
page.content: The squash club is based in a beautiful old building called Old Hall Farm and is situated next to St.Mary's Church. There are four courts,a snooker table,a pool table,and a licenced bar.It is privately run and has a high membership. Members of the club involve themselves in social activities as well as sporting ones.Dances,discos,quizzes etc. are regularly organised. A feature of the club is the size of its junior membership. The cub has members,not only from East Leake,but from a large area surrounding it. Regular matches are played against other clubs in the neighbouring districts.
